txt.en:
'You would take up the Wild Hunt, [placeholder]?

'I warn you that it is not for the faint of heart -- but if you would complete it, you must face an ancient beast, fast as the wind and of a tempest's mood. Seek it out, if you will, in the  heart of the Mournshaws and challenge it.

'I shall await your return here, should you survive.'
'You have faced my challenge and prevailed, [placeholder]. Go forth and complete the Wild Hunt and earn the Huntsman's favour, if you would win passage for your allies.'

As you kneel by the waters of the pool, a strangely mesmerizing glow emanates from the waters.

Feeling dazed as you stare into the glowing water, you reach down to cup a handful and bring it to your lips....

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest, and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
Gwenaewen has bidden you challenge an ancient spirit as a test of quickness in the Wild Hunt that the Huntsman has set before you.
Gwenaewen's spirit dwells in the heart of the Mournshaws.\n\nGwenaewen has charged you with hunting her falcon-spirit servant.
Talk to Gwenaewen at the Huntsman's Hall
Gwenaewen is at the Huntsman's Hall.\n\nYou should return to Gwenaewen and tell her that you have overcome her challenge.
